name: train, wreck!
description:
After a heavy storm, something hard and fast is needed to clear the wreckage from the tracks. As a trained conductor, this should come as an easy task. 

Let your train wreck and clear all the trees blocking the tracks before you arrive at the hangar! (note: trains drive best while on tracks, so make sure you won't derail!)

CONTROLS: A/D or arrow keys

[made for trijam #85 with the theme "hard and fast"]
